hadiths.text: Al-Awza'i narrated from Az-Zuhri, from 'Urwah, from Jabir, who said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Whoever is given something on the basis of 'Umra, it belongs to him and to his descendants, and is inherited by those who inherit from him

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى الزُّهْرِيِّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Reports From Az-Zuhri About It
